TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but bill miscalculated the angles so your rocket over controlls and spins all over the place.

I wish for a proper spaceplane.

Edited April 4, 2016 by Q-ver KSP
mispell

Granted, but it's a giant plane that sticks into space so you have to walk to orbit.

i wish more people replied to guess who will reply next and ban the user above you and faster.

Granted, but people get bored after 5 minutes and never reply again.

I wish for a sandwich.

Granted, but it is a lead sandwich, with lead foil in between slabs of uranium, all drizzled with a nice coating of mercury. Mmm!

I wish I owned a microscope that can see viruses.

Granted, but the samples make you really  sick and you leave the microscope in a box.

I do not wish my wish is not corrupted   (-) + (-) = + so: not + not = yes.

Granted, but the universe breaks because math.

I wish I could understand math easier.

Granted, but you undesrtand it tooo much that you are taken to are fifty-one, I mean... kifty-one and then get investigated.

I wish I could produce better music with Fl Studio.

11 minutes ago, Q-ver KSP said:

Granted, but you undesrtand it tooo much that you are taken to are fifty-one, I mean... kifty-one and then get investigated.

I wish I could produce better music with Fl Studio.

Granted, but you are barred from using Fl Studio ever again.

I wish I could divide by zero...

Granted, but your math teacher gives you an F.

i wish that ksp is allowed in school.

1 hour ago, Q-ver KSP said:

Granted, but the samples make you really  sick and you leave the microscope in a box.

Actually, I wanted it so that I can look at the stuff in my blood that has already made me sick!

34 minutes ago, max_creative said:

i wish that ksp is allowed in school.

Granted, but all the computers have Windows Vista and 1 gig of RAM.

I wish I had 6 different types of color-detecting cells in my eyes instead of 3.

4 minutes ago, cubinator said:

Actually, I wanted it so that I can look at the stuff in my blood that has already made me sick!

Granted, but all the computers have Windows Vista and 1 gig of RAM.

I wish I had 6 different types of color-detecting cells in my eyes instead of 3.

granted.

However the nearest building to you collapses.

 

I wish I do not have exams and I can work at Adblockplus

(PS. there are recruiting students. so check their twitter)

You could work at Adblockplus, but their ad got blocked.

I wish for a functional fusion reactor, free of glitches, which powers a city.

Granted, but it has a meltdown.

i wish that I can get a 20,000 ton rocket of the ground.

Granted, but it only works on Gilly.

I wish for a reactionless drive that has an efficiency greater than 300000000MW/N.

Granted, but you kill your kerbals with the high G-forces/

I wish you would change your avatar for April fools.

Granted. It breaks down after twenty seconds.

I wish that the next person to reply would do so in Comic Sans

granted, but now you must get a lecture on why ksp is more fun than Legos. 

Blah blah blah blah blah... Something rocket science blah blah... A powered gravity assist blah blah... 

I wish that everyone will go check This out and scroll to the bottom of the page.

Granted, but there's nothing particularly interesting there.

I wish the wind would stop blowing in my town.

Granted. But the wind somehow becomes a hurricane.

I wish my computer was newer.

Edited April 5, 2016 by Fredbear12returns

Granted, but it's from the future so you don't know how to right click.

I wish people would stop skipping over my stuff.

Granted, but you are banned from the forums, now you won't be able to ninja people so that by the time they're done replying to a post you've already replied! It's a win-win!

 

Edit: I wish I remembered to make a wish.

Edited April 5, 2016 by DolphinDude3

I wish people would stop skipping over my stuff.

Right click! If that will still  exist in many years then you are right. Maybe he is left-handed.

-Granted, they stop skipping them but someone bans you from KSP forums forever.

I wish I had already finished my homework.

(need to to a lot of homework.)

Granted, but your get all F's.

i wish our computer mouse had right click and our keyboard f9. 

(Oh and BTW I'm also in school. NO HOMEWORK TODAY THOUGH!!!)

Granted, but they don't work properly.

I wish everybody in my play was already rehearsed so I didn't have to go rehearse.

Granted, but then you accidentally gets hit with a background and the have to cancel it.

i wish that the pizza was done already!

What? I'm hungry.
